com.hourglassapps.serialise

Class ReGroupHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hourglassapps.serialise.ReGroupHandler

  • public class ReGroupHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Recognises strings matching a particular regular expression and invokes a specified SearchAndReplacer instance to generate an alternative String. This String is typically pushed to an output Buffer.
    Author:
    kieran

      • numCharsToStartOfGroup

      • pushCharsBetween

        private int pushCharsBetween(char[] pSrc,
                   int pStartIdx,
                   int pGroupIdx,
                   int pGroupLen)
        Pushes an unchanged subarray of chars to the output Buffer. This subarray begins (inclusively) at a specified index of pSrc and ends (inclusively) at the character index preceding the mPat instance.
        Parameters:
        pSrc -
        pStartIdx - start idx within pSrc
        pGroupIdx -
        pGroupLen -
        Returns:
        character index after mPat match.

      • push

        public int push(char[] pSrc,
       int pLen)
        Preprocesses a subarray of chars invoking mReplacer to deal with any sequence of characters requiring special attention.
        Parameters:
        pSrc -
        pLen - number of characters in pSrc that must be prepreprocessed in this method invocation. Typically pLen is the number of characters from the start of pSrc to the beginning of a line we do not yet wish to preprocess, but it can extend to include multiple lines across the entire populated length of pSrc.
        Returns:
        number of characters pushed to output Buffer.
